sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO TB_MINES_HAZARDS(
DWDM, MINE_NAME, ADDRESS, YZBM, ZYFZR, LXDH, SJFRDW, CKRQ, DESIGN_ABLITY, REAL_ABLITY, KCKZ, KCCL, GDZC, NLR, JJLX, KTFS, TFFS, TSFS, GDFS, TSSCDZDS, ZBSCDZDS, TSSCDCCS, JXTSZYRS, KJZJFL, KJYXFLL, KJZDYSL, ZJZDZHPSL, YXLXDKJWS, YXLXDKJM, YXLXDKJFH, YXLXDKJKC, YXLXDKJMXDK, YXLXDKJFSX, YXLXDKJGLK, YXLXDKJCJDY, SJHQJDJX, SPXDHJQDJX, DMBZCLKFS, DMBZCLZY, DMBZCLLG, JXBZCLTSS, JXBZCLZY, JSBZCLLG, KQFJQK, LNSW, KQQTKQ, KQZKZL, XYSCJQK, KJSDSLLX, SWDZKJ, KTDDBHSCQK, KTDDBYFHSC, KJSFSTWX, CJDYWH, KQDCSM, XDWYWDX, JXCYSBSL, JXYYSBSL, JXGZYLCFDD, JXGZYLCFSL, DSSSJSL, YNXFHCSSSD, YNXFHCSJZ, YNXFHCSZH, YNXFHCSQC, YNXFHCSZZ, YNXFHCSWD, QTCS, DMFSCRL, JXXFSGCD, JXYHQT, KJYWHQ, KQNYWTXWXQY, SFJZSTDLKC, KJAQSFSLJYX, JWNSG, QSRS, ZSRS, SWRS, JKYLZDSGSZ, JKYLZDSGHZ, JKYLZDSGMD, JKYLZDSGZGMC, JKYLZDSGQT, ZSXH, ZSSL, JSXH, JSSL, ZPSGXH, ZPSGSL, TFSSBXH, TFSSBSL, JCTSSBXH, JCTSSBSL, JSRYSGJ, JSRYSZJ, JSRYSCJ, DGRS, JCSJRS, FBRS, CKFF, XYKJWTSM, BZ, TBLXDH, TBR, TBRQ,
ID, STATUS, CREATED, CREATE_TIME, UPDATED, UPDATE_TIME) values(
#dwdm#, #mineName#, #address#, #yzbm#, #zyfzr#, #lxdh#, #sjfrdw#, #ckrq#, #designAblity#, #realAblity#, #kckz#, #kccl#, #gdzc#, #nlr#, #jjlx#, #ktfs#, #tffs#, #tsfs#, #gdfs#, #tsscdzds#, #zbscdzds#, #tsscdccs#, #jxtszyrs#, #kjzjfl#, #kjyxfll#, #kjzdysl#, #zjzdzhpsl#, #yxlxdkjws#, #yxlxdkjm#, #yxlxdkjfh#, #yxlxdkjkc#, #yxlxdkjmxdk#, #yxlxdkjfsx#, #yxlxdkjglk#, #yxlxdkjcjdy#, #sjhqjdjx#, #spxdhjqdjx#, #dmbzclkfs#, #dmbzclzy#, #dmbzcllg#, #jxbzcltss#, #jxbzclzy#, #jsbzcllg#, #kqfjqk#, #lnsw#, #kqqtkq#, #kqzkzl#, #xyscjqk#, #kjsdsllx#, #swdzkj#, #ktddbhscqk#, #ktddbyfhsc#, #kjsfstwx#, #cjdywh#, #kqdcsm#, #xdwywdx#, #jxcysbsl#, #jxyysbsl#, #jxgzylcfdd#, #jxgzylcfsl#, #dsssjsl#, #ynxfhcsssd#, #ynxfhcsjz#, #ynxfhcszh#, #ynxfhcsqc#, #ynxfhcszz#, #ynxfhcswd#, #qtcs#, #dmfscrl#, #jxxfsgcd#, #jxyhqt#, #kjywhq#, #kqnywtxwxqy#, #sfjzstdlkc#, #kjaqsfsljyx#, #jwnsg#, #qsrs#, #zsrs#, #swrs#, #jkylzdsgsz#, #jkylzdsghz#, #jkylzdsgmd#, #jkylzdsgzgmc#, #jkylzdsgqt#, #zsxh#, #zssl#, #jsxh#, #jssl#, #zpsgxh#, #zpsgsl#, #tfssbxh#, #tfssbsl#, #jctssbxh#, #jctssbsl#, #jsrysgj#, #jsryszj#, #jsryscj#, #dgrs#, #jcsjrs#, #fbrs#, #ckff#, #xykjwtsm#, #bz#, #tblxdh#, #tbr#, #tbrq#,
#id#, #status#, #created#, #createTime#, #updated#, #updateTime#)
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE TB_MINES_HAZARDS SET STATUS='0' WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT TB_ENTERPRISE.CORP_NAME AS corpName, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.DWDM AS dwdm, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.MINE_NAME AS mineName, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.ADDRESS AS address, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.YZBM AS yzbm, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.ID AS id, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.STATUS AS status, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.CREATED AS created, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.UPDATED AS updated, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.UPDATE_TIME as updateTime from TB_MINES_HAZARDS LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_MINES_HAZARDS.DWDM= TB_ENTERPRISE.ID where TB_MINES_HAZARDS.ID=#id#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE TB_MINES_HAZARDS
DWDM=#dwdm# MINE_NAME=#mineName# ADDRESS=#address# YZBM=#yzbm# ZYFZR=#zyfzr# LXDH=#lxdh# SJFRDW=#sjfrdw# CKRQ=#ckrq# DESIGN_ABLITY=#designAblity# REAL_ABLITY=#realAblity# KCKZ=#kckz# KCCL=#kccl# GDZC=#gdzc# NLR=#nlr# JJLX=#jjlx# KTFS=#ktfs# TFFS=#tffs# TSFS=#tsfs# GDFS=#gdfs# TSSCDZDS=#tsscdzds# ZBSCDZDS=#zbscdzds# TSSCDCCS=#tsscdccs# JXTSZYRS=#jxtszyrs# KJZJFL=#kjzjfl# KJYXFLL=#kjyxfll# KJZDYSL=#kjzdysl# ZJZDZHPSL=#zjzdzhpsl# YXLXDKJWS=#yxlxdkjws# YXLXDKJM=#yxlxdkjm# YXLXDKJFH=#yxlxdkjfh# YXLXDKJKC=#yxlxdkjkc# YXLXDKJMXDK=#yxlxdkjmxdk# YXLXDKJFSX=#yxlxdkjfsx# YXLXDKJGLK=#yxlxdkjglk# YXLXDKJCJDY=#yxlxdkjcjdy# SJHQJDJX=#sjhqjdjx# SPXDHJQDJX=#spxdhjqdjx# DMBZCLKFS=#dmbzclkfs# DMBZCLZY=#dmbzclzy# DMBZCLLG=#dmbzcllg# JXBZCLTSS=#jxbzcltss# JXBZCLZY=#jxbzclzy# JSBZCLLG=#jsbzcllg# KQFJQK=#kqfjqk# LNSW=#lnsw# KQQTKQ=#kqqtkq# KQZKZL=#kqzkzl# XYSCJQK=#xyscjqk# KJSDSLLX=#kjsdsllx# SWDZKJ=#swdzkj# KTDDBHSCQK=#ktddbhscqk# KTDDBYFHSC=#ktddbyfhsc# KJSFSTWX=#kjsfstwx# CJDYWH=#cjdywh# KQDCSM=#kqdcsm# XDWYWDX=#xdwywdx# JXCYSBSL=#jxcysbsl# JXYYSBSL=#jxyysbsl# JXGZYLCFDD=#jxgzylcfdd# JXGZYLCFSL=#jxgzylcfsl# DSSSJSL=#dsssjsl# YNXFHCSSSD=#ynxfhcsssd# YNXFHCSJZ=#ynxfhcsjz# YNXFHCSZH=#ynxfhcszh# YNXFHCSQC=#ynxfhcsqc# YNXFHCSZZ=#ynxfhcszz# YNXFHCSWD=#ynxfhcswd# QTCS=#qtcs# DMFSCRL=#dmfscrl# JXXFSGCD=#jxxfsgcd# JXYHQT=#jxyhqt# KJYWHQ=#kjywhq# KQNYWTXWXQY=#kqnywtxwxqy# SFJZSTDLKC=#sfjzstdlkc# KJAQSFSLJYX=#kjaqsfsljyx# JWNSG=#jwnsg# QSRS=#qsrs# ZSRS=#zsrs# SWRS=#swrs# JKYLZDSGSZ=#jkylzdsgsz# JKYLZDSGHZ=#jkylzdsghz# JKYLZDSGMD=#jkylzdsgmd# JKYLZDSGZGMC=#jkylzdsgzgmc# JKYLZDSGQT=#jkylzdsgqt# ZSXH=#zsxh# ZSSL=#zssl# JSXH=#jsxh# JSSL=#jssl# ZPSGXH=#zpsgxh# ZPSGSL=#zpsgsl# TFSSBXH=#tfssbxh# TFSSBSL=#tfssbsl# JCTSSBXH=#jctssbxh# JCTSSBSL=#jctssbsl# JSRYSGJ=#jsrysgj# JSRYSZJ=#jsryszj# JSRYSCJ=#jsryscj# DGRS=#dgrs# JCSJRS=#jcsjrs# FBRS=#fbrs# CKFF=#ckff# XYKJWTSM=#xykjwtsm# BZ=#bz# TBLXDH=#tblxdh# TBR=#tbr# TBRQ=#tbrq#
ID=#id# STATUS=#status# CREATED=#created# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# UPDATED=#updated# UPDATE_TIME=#updateTime#
WHERE ID=#id#
sqlMap.select:

TB_MINES_HAZARDS.ID AS id, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.STATUS AS status, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.CREATED AS created, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.UPDATED AS updated, TB_MINES_HAZARDS.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime from TB_MINES_HAZARDS LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_MINES_HAZARDS.DWDM= TB_ENTERPRISE.ID WHERE TB_MINES_HAZARDS.STATUS = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) from TB_MINES_HAZARDS LEFT JOIN TB_ENTERPRISE ON TB_MINES_HAZARDS.DWDM= TB_ENTERPRISE.ID WHERE TB_MINES_HAZARDS.STATUS = '1'
